title: Audio clipping / distortion on top speaker on Pixel 5 after May AND June 2021 Security Update
content:
Edit: The issue resolved itself after a few days.

Edit 2: The issue has reappeared immediately after the June 2021 Security Update, exactly as described below.

After the May 2021 Security Update, the top speaker of my Pixel 5 has started exhibiting audio clipping / distortion almost all the time, but most evident with 's' sounds in speech, and higher pitch noises.

Can you please investigate? I have submitted feedback in the Settings app.

Anyone please comment if your Pixel 5 top speaker is also clipping / distorting after the May AND June 2021 Security Update.
